Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package prometheus for versions less than 2.37.9-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package prometheus for versions less than 2.37.9-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus is earlier than 2.37.9-6, affected by CVE-2025-65637
